items.sentence: I had no idea that Tom and Mary were lying to us.
As soon as I get to Boston, I'll give you a call.
The surgeon persuaded me to undergo an operation.
We associate Darwin with the theory of evolution.
The teacher took notice of the student's mistake.
In case of an emergency, phone me at this number.
I had your best interest in mind the entire time.
If you lie down with dogs, you get up with fleas.
I put a couple of slices of bread in the toaster.
Is there anyone here who isn't afraid to do that?
